name: Wild Wild Zoo
description:
Take your revenge upon the ones who locked you away. You're now out of their control, destroy as much as you can before they lock the area !

# Controls

  • LEFT/RIGHT or A/D or Q/D to turn 
  • UP/DOWN or W/S or Z/S to accelerate/move back
  • R to restart the level 
  • ENTER to validate character & level selection
  • ESCAPE twice to leave the game for the main menu

---

# About

Wild Wild Zoo is made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam (https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam).

Base structure for this game is forked from (https://github.com/deepnight/gameBase).
The language is Haxe (https://haxe.org).
Builds are done with Hashlink (https://hashlink.haxe.org), a virtual machine, working on all platforms. 
And using Heaps (https://heaps.io), a 2D/3D Haxe library (ie. an Haxelib). All of those tools are free and open-source.

# Credits

Code by @grimo0 & sbij
Art by jonaZu
Sounds generated using BFXR and music by Anonymous420 (https://chezmonplaisir.bandcamp.com/music)
